analytic.title: “Sin Was Planted in Our Father Adam and in Our Mother Eve on the Day They Sinned. It Entered and Lived in All Their Children” (LG 19, 3): Evil and Sin in the Syriac Liber Graduum

monogr.title: “Inherited Sin?” Erbsünde?: Forscher aus dem Osten und Westen Europas an den Quellen des gemeinsamen Glaubens. Studientagung Wien, 15.–19. September 2021 “Inherited Sin?”

body.bibl: Argárate, Pablo. “‘Sin Was Planted in Our Father Adam and in Our Mother Eve on the Day They Sinned. It Entered and Lived in All Their Children’ (LG 19, 3): Evil and Sin in the Syriac Liber Graduum.” In “Inherited Sin?” Erbsünde?: Forscher Aus Dem Osten Und Westen Europas an Den Quellen Des Gemeinsamen Glaubens. Studientagung Wien, 15.–19. September 2021 “Inherited Sin?,” edited by Theresia Hainthaler, Franz Mali, Gregor Emmenegger, and Alexey A. Morozov, 137–55. Pro Oriente 44, Wiener Patristische Tagungen 10. Innsbruck: Tyrolia Verlag, 2024.

Pablo Argárate, ‘Sin Was Planted in Our Father Adam and in Our Mother Eve on the Day They Sinned. It Entered and Lived in All Their Children’ (LG 19, 3): Evil and Sin in the Syriac Liber Graduum,” in “Inherited Sin? Erbsünde?: Forscher Aus Dem Osten Und Westen Europas an Den Quellen Des Gemeinsamen Glaubens. Studientagung Wien, 15.–19. September 2021 Inherited Sin?, ed.
